title: Disconnected after loading into match
body: my game always disconnects after champion select is done and the champion screen is visible for a minute. cant even do practice mode it disconnects there too please help!!

replies.body: Most of the time that's a pretty good sign that your network can't get a solid connection with the game servers specifically. I'd like to check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick just to make sure everything is set up in the best way for League to run. Hit me back up and let me know how that helps!
I set up firewall and DNS and almost everything I could but this is a reoccurring thing that happens randomly. before all I had to do was reinstall the game now that doesn't even work.

That's a little odd that reinstalling was the only thing that's worked in the past. There must be an easier way to get that fixed up, and our tech guys are probably better equipped to help in this situation. Hit them up through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to look into your system specs more and I can here!
